picked_headlines.summary: Agentic AI enhances financial crime compliance with automation and explainability.
picked_headlines.reason_for_choice: This article bridges AI technology with practical applications in compliance, making it relevant for both technical and managerial audiences.

picked_headlines.summary: FastDriveVLA optimizes autonomous driving with efficient token pruning.
picked_headlines.reason_for_choice: This article highlights advancements in autonomous driving technology, appealing to engineering and product development stakeholders.

digest:
- *YOLOv8 vs YOLOv11*: A comparative study on underwater vision tasks reveals YOLOv10's optimal speed-accuracy for AUVs. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.12682)
- *MetaLLMix*: An XAI-aided meta-learning approach optimizes hyperparameters, reducing costs and training times. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.09387)
- *LoRA/QLoRA Efficiency*: Benchmarks fine-tuning on RTX 4060, providing insights for LLMs on consumer GPUs. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.12229)
- *Quantum-Inspired Diabetes Prediction*: Combines quantum techniques with ML for better accuracy in diabetes risk prediction. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.12259)
- *TinyServe*: Enhances LLM serving efficiency with query-aware cache selection, achieving speed and memory savings. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.12211)
- *Ratio1 AI Meta-OS*: A decentralized AI meta-OS using blockchain for secure, efficient AI model deployment. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.12223)
- *Scaling Agents*: Introduces continual pre-training for agentic models, achieving state-of-the-art results. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.13310)
- *LTA-thinker*: Enhances reasoning in LLMs by optimizing latent thought generation, achieving state-of-the-art performance. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.12875)
- *ReSum*: Improves LLM agents by summarizing context for better long-horizon search. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.13313)
- *Match Chat*: Enhances tennis fan experience with real-time AI, achieving high accuracy and uptime. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.12592)
